short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A stealthy browser extension for pausing history recording. Vanish without a trace during your web adventures.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:
• One-Click Toggle: Instantly pause or resume history recording
• Recent History View: See a list of recently removed browsing records
• Clear historical deletion records

How It Works:
1. Click the Houdini icon to pause history recording
2. Browse freely without leaving traces
3. Click again to resume normal history recording
4. View recently removed records anytime

Privacy First:
• No data collection or storage on our end
• Works locally on your browser

Change Log:
v1.0.2
- Support deleting Houdini's deletion records
